name: docpad-plugin-coffeekup
description: Adds support for CoffeeKup compilation to DocPad
readme:
# CoffeeKup Plugin for DocPad Adds support for [CoffeeKup](http://coffeekup.org/) to HTML compilation to [DocPad](https://docpad.org) Convention: `.html.coffee` ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-coffeekup ``` ## Configure ### Compress By default we compress the output for all environments except the development environment. Set the `format` option to either `true` or `false` to change this (`true` formats nicely, `false` compresses). ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
